sentences.en: But if you touch my tummy right now, you can feel it.
sentences.cn: 但你现摸我的肚子, 你会感觉它的.

sentences.en: Do you have to put that in my tummy?
sentences.cn: 你真得把那玩意放到我肚子里去?

sentences.en: He was up all night with tummy ache .
sentences.cn: 他肚子疼，整晚都睡不着觉。

sentences.en: I ate a big Thanksgiving dinner, and now my tummy hurts.
sentences.cn: 我饱吃了一顿感恩节正餐, 现在胃疼.

sentences.en: If I get another tummy ache, I will wire you to come.
sentences.cn: 如果我再肚子疼,我会发电报让你来.

sentences.en: It was only a tummy ache.
It's easy to get a tummy upset from river water.
She'd undergone 13 operations, including a tummy tuck.
sentences.cn: 她已经做了13次手术，包括一次腹部瘦身整形手术。

sentences.en: That's right, the tummy split and you popped out.
sentences.cn: 是的, 肚皮裂开,你就出来了.

sentences.en: The frog drank and he got a big tummy.
sentences.cn: 他喝呀喝呀,他的肚子越来越大.

sentences.en: There is still some tenderness in her tummy.
Watch out the oar doesn't pop you in the tummy.
Wow! What a wild marking on a white tummy!
sentences.cn: 噢! 它还有长满大黑点的白色腹部呢!

trans.tran_en: stomach  – used especially by or to children
